name: Cube (itch) (competor)
description:
A short sokoban puzzle game on the theme of dice.

WASD/Arrow to move. Z to undo. ESC exits to the main menu.

X to make a checkpoint, R to restart from there.

Made in 48h for the GMTK Game Jam 2022. 

[hack] https://auroriax.github.io/PuzzleScript/editor.html?hack=e0370bec295f139da8493ab...
